thread.title: Homeowner who paved over own front lawn ordered to rip it up or face court by property developer he bought the house from
thread.title_full: Homeowner who paved over own front lawn ordered to rip it up or face court by property developer he bought the house from

author: lfruen
title: Homeowner who paved over own front lawn ordered to rip it up or face court by property developer he bought the house from
text:
Opinion CRAZY PAVING Homeowner who paved over own front lawn ordered to rip it up or face court by property developer he bought the house from 
John Twidale received a letter from Gleeson Homes saying he will have to change it back - despite owning the property By LAUREN FRUEN
